# SlidingWindowTransformer.WindowSequence

**Structure**

An async sequence of windows.

## Declaration

```swift
struct WindowSequence
```

## Getting the count

- **count**: The number of elements in the sequence.

## Creating an iterator

- **SlidingWindowTransformer.WindowSequence.Iterator**: An async iterator of window sequence.

## Performing the transformation

- **applied(to:eventHandler:)**: Extracts a window sequence from the input sequence

## Conforms To

- AsyncSequence
- TemporalSequence

items.description: The number of elements in the sequence.
items.name: count

items.description: An async iterator of window sequence.
